titleStmt.title: The distressed virgin, or, The false young-man and the constant maid, the qualities of them both displaid to an excellent new tune.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, J. Clarke, W. Thackeray, and T. Passinger,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Martin Parker by Wing.
Imprint date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
